original_title: Let us continue with our performances...
original_body_lines: Several artists and musicians held a media briefing yesterday and urged the government and relevant authorities not to stop the music festival which is currently being held in Track 18 at Rajangana. They claimed that they were unaware why the musical event organized by Aura Lanka Entertainment (Pvt.) Ltd is being stopped. Pix by Nimalsiri Edirisinghe
